wiki.summary: "Spicy" is a song recorded by South Korean girl group aespa for their third extended play, MY WORLD. It was released on May 8, 2023 alongside the EP as the second and final single. The track was written by Bang Hye-yeon, composed by Ludvig Evers, Jonatan Gusmark, Kim Yeon-seo and Moa “Cazzi Opeia” Carlebecker, and arranged by Moonshine and JINBYJIN. Read more on Last.fm.
